inclusion.criterion: Endoscopic confirmation or portal hypertension related GI bleeding
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Over the age of 18 with the ability to willingly sign an informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate performance status and cognitive ability
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be willing to comply with all FDA-mandated prescribing and safety while taking Thalidomide
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hemodynamically stable with no evidence of ongoing bleeding (defined as a Hgb that has not varied by more than 10% over 12 hour period.)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: No other serious illness or medical condition including unstable cardiac disease requiring treatment, new onset crescendo or rest angina. Stable exertional angina is acceptable.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: No history of significant neurological or psychiatric disorders including psychotic disorders, dementia, or seizures or active infection
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has HCV Cirrhosis and grade II esophageal varices. Recent admission for UGIB due to NSAID gastritis.
